DOC.brief_summary: To study the association of the thoracic fluid content and acute lung injury during liver transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Thoracic Fluid Content and Acute Lung Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Acute lung injury is not uncommon after liver transplantation. A new monitor non-invasive cardiac output monitor (NICOM) is designed to measure thoracic fluid content. The investigators attempt to use the parameter thoracic fluid content to investigate its relationship with acute lung injury in liver transplant recipients.
DOC.criteria: end stage liver disease scheduled for liver transplantation in National Taiwna University Hospital. allergic reaction history of aortic regurgitation preexisting pulmonary disease
